title: NAVAJA
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130816084525im_/http:/typophile.com/files/navaja-logo-jkoangulo_4860.jpg)

After several attempts we finally finished the logo for Navaja.org my own design studio.  
Have some of Francisco Galvez's Australis and Typetogether Maiola.

And the support from [Cristian Gonzalez](http://web.archive.org/web/20130816084525/http:/typophile.com/user/659) and [Eli Castellanos](http://web.archive.org/web/20130816084525/http:/cocijotype.com/blog/)

the atempts:

author: jko
